data.name: Расписание2.Tag
data.value:
SELECT l.lesson_number AS 'Номер пары', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'ПН' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'ПН', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'ВТ' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'ВТ', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'СР' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'СР', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'ЧТ' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'ЧТ', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'ПТ' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'ПТ', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'СБ' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'СБ' FROM (SELECT 1 AS lesson_number UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6) AS l LEFT JOIN schedule s ON l.lesson_number = s.lesson_number AND s.week = 'Верхняя' AND s.group_name = '{0}' LEFT JOIN teachers t ON s.id_tutor = t.tutor_id GROUP BY l.lesson_number ORDER BY l.lesson_number;

data.name: Академы.Tag
data.value: SELECT academics.student_id, `student_card`, `expulsion_group`, `expulsion_date`, `expulsion_order`, `restoration_group`, `restoration_date`, `restoration_order` FROM `academics`, `students` WHERE expulsion_group = '{0}' AND academics.student_id = students.student_id

data.name: Документы.Tag
data.value: SELECT documents.student_id, students.student_card, `passport_series`, `passport_number`, `inn`, `snils`, `military_status` FROM `documents`, `students` WHERE documents.student_id = students.student_id AND students.group_name = '{0}'

data.name: Адреса.Tag
data.value: SELECT a.address_id, s.student_card, a.city, a.street, a.house, a.apartment FROM addresses a LEFT JOIN students s ON s.registered_address_id = a.address_id OR s.actual_address_id = a.address_id WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM students s1 WHERE (s1.registered_address_id = a.address_id OR s1.actual_address_id = a.address_id)) OR NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM students s2 WHERE (s2.registered_address_id = a.address_id OR s2.actual_address_id = a.address_id) AND s2.group_name <> '{0}');

data.name: guna2HtmlLabel27.Tag
data.value: SELECT CONCAT(COALESCE(a.city, ''), ', ул. ', COALESCE(a.street, ''), ', д. ', COALESCE(a.house, ''), ', кв. ', COALESCE(a.apartment, '')) AS actual_address FROM addresses a JOIN students s ON actual_address_id = a.address_id WHERE s.student_card = '{0}';

data.name: guna2HtmlLabel28.Tag
data.value: SELECT CONCAT(COALESCE(a.city, ''), ', ул. ', COALESCE(a.street, ''), ', д. ', COALESCE(a.house, ''), ', кв. ', COALESCE(a.apartment, '')) AS registered_address FROM addresses a JOIN students s ON s.registered_address_id = a.address_id WHERE s.student_card = '{0}';

data.value: SELECT CONCAT(COALESCE(a.city, ''), ', ул. ', COALESCE(a.street, ''), ', д. ', COALESCE(a.house, ''), ', кв. ', COALESCE(a.apartment, '')) AS registered_address FROM addresses a JOIN students s ON s.registered_address_id = a.address_id WHERE s.student_card = '{0}';

data.value: SELECT CONCAT(COALESCE(a.city, ''), ', ул. ', COALESCE(a.street, ''), ', д. ', COALESCE(a.house, ''), ', кв. ', COALESCE(a.apartment, '')) AS actual_address FROM addresses a JOIN students s ON actual_address_id = a.address_id WHERE s.student_card = '{0}';

data.name: guna2TileButton11.Tag
data.value:
SELECT l.lesson_number AS 'Номер пары', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'ПН' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'ПН', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'ВТ' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'ВТ', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'СР' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'СР', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'ЧТ' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'ЧТ', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'ПТ' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'ПТ', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'СБ' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'СБ' FROM (SELECT 1 AS lesson_number UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6) AS l LEFT JOIN schedule s ON l.lesson_number = s.lesson_number AND s.week = 'Верхняя' AND s.group_name = '{0}' LEFT JOIN teachers t ON s.id_tutor = t.tutor_id GROUP BY l.lesson_number ORDER BY l.lesson_number;

data.name: guna2TileButton10.Tag
data.value:
SELECT l.lesson_number AS 'Номер пары', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'ПН' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'ПН', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'ВТ' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'ВТ', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'СР' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'СР', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'ЧТ' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'ЧТ', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'ПТ' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'ПТ', MAX(CASE WHEN s.weekday = 'СБ' THEN CONCAT(s.subject_name, '
', t.last_name, ' ', LEFT(t.first_name,1), '.', LEFT(t.middle_name,1), '.') ELSE '' END) AS 'СБ' FROM (SELECT 1 AS lesson_number UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6) AS l LEFT JOIN schedule s ON l.lesson_number = s.lesson_number AND s.week = 'Нижняя' AND s.group_name = '{0}' LEFT JOIN teachers t ON s.id_tutor = t.tutor_id GROUP BY l.lesson_number ORDER BY l.lesson_number;
